<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/buckets"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



A bucket is a resource that is used to store data objects and their associated metadata. This method returns all content within existing buckets.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
